title: Man Who Rode His Ten Speed Bicycle to the Moon
description: Near Fine/Very Good. First Edition Hardcover. Name and date to front end paper. No other marks or inscriptions. A very clean very tight copy with bright unmarked green cloth boards, very slight yellowing to edges of boards and no bumping to corners. Dust jacket not price clipped or marked or torn with minor creasing and traces of storage. 97pp. Fantasy novel about a man's journey from the doldrums of career and marriage to a splendid autonomy as he rediscovers himself. ISBN 0340239689
author: Bernard Fischman
